Summary: 5 people saw a very large.....ufo.......car slid .underneath it
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around May 9th 1974
divs: sighting details5 girls were leaving a wedding shower we desided to travel down a new road that had just opeaned..most of this land had been fields. when one of the girls yeled look.! "c" was driving and slamed on the brakes and we slid on to the sholder of the new road. we were under the very very large round craft, you could see a orangish glow rolling under and around this craft. it was a very warm night and we all had the windowes down , one of the girls ,"t" started to scream hit the seat and shout..roll up the windows. so we did ..i tryed not to take my eyes off the craft because i knew this was probley my only chance to see something of this nature. i was in the back seat on the passanger side "t" sat next to me.this large craft disapeared while i was looking at it. we gathered our thoughts and started to look for it again a few hundred yards a way we once again saw it moving over a line of trees. there was a road there and we tryed to follow it and it disapeared again. we decided that it was best to go home that is when i got in trouble for being so late by my mother. i didnt understand how it was 1hr & 40mi . latter than i thought it should be. my mother and i had a big argument as to were i was. i told her about seeing this hughe ufo . she was mad and i am not sure she belived me..it didnt matter i was very tired and just wanted to sleep. this group of us road to school together and we decised not to tell classmates about our experance . i for one was still tired and did not want to have explain anything.....this craft was 2 or 3 hundreds of yards in size..i am sure there was an abduction dew to the missing time but dont remember any thing about it i was not scared or frightened..and am still grateful for the experance...[cms\tg\pid]
